title: Social media content creator
job_overview:
Job Description 

Position Summary:
We’re seeking a creative and self-driven Content Creator to help us build a strong presence on Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube through short-form videos (Reels, Shorts). This role includes video editing, voiceover scripting, and helping shape our social media brand. Bonus if you’re also familiar with social media growth strategies and can help plan content calendars.



   Responsibilities:
	•	Create 3–7 engaging Reels/Shorts per week (voiceovers, captions, trending audio, transitions)
	•	Write or collaborate on short scripts and voiceovers
	•	Repurpose raw footage, interviews, or clips into viral-style content
	•	Stay updated on trends, audio, hashtags, and hooks that work
	•	Collaborate on content strategy and weekly planning
	•	(Optional) Schedule and post across platforms
	•	(Optional) Monitor performance and tweak content for better engagement



  Requirements:
	•	Strong experience editing short-form videos (Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts)
	•	Proficient in tools like CapCut, Adobe Premiere Rush, or similar
	•	Ability to generate creative ideas from raw content or prompts
	•	Bonus: voiceover or voice editing skills
	•	Bonus: past work with personal brands or businesses in real estate, trucking. 
	•	Strong communication skills and reliability



 Bonus Points:
	•	Knows how to hook attention in the first 3 seconds
	•	Understands how to grow engagement and following organically
	•	Has a portfolio or examples of Reels/Shorts they’ve made


****attach 3-5 examples of your recent work!****
